original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Opammakathāpañha
analyzed: opamma kathā pañha

original: Makkaṭakavagga
analyzed: makkaṭaka vagga

original: 6. Meghaṅgapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, ‘meghassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena meghassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, megho uppannaṁ rajojallaṁ vūpasameti;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja meghaḥ uppannam rajaḥ jallam vūpasameti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uppannaṁ kilesarajojallaṁ vūpasametabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena uppannam kilesa rajaḥ jallam

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, meghassa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja meghassa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, megho pathaviyā uṇhaṁ nibbāpeti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja meghaḥ pathaviyāḥ uṇham nibbāpeti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena mettābhāvanāya sadevako loko nibbāpetabbo.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena mettā bhāvanāya sa devakaḥ lokaḥ nibbāpetabbaḥ

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, meghassa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja meghassa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, megho sabbabījāni viruhāpeti;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja meghaḥ sabba bījāni viruhāpeti

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattānaṁ saddhaṁ uppādetvā taṁ saddhābījaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena sabba sattānam saddham uppādetvā tam saddhā bīja

original: tīsu sampattīsu ropetabbaṁ, dibbamānusikāsu sukhasampattīsu yāvaparamatthanibbānasukhasampatti.
analyzed: tīsu sampattīsu dibba mānusikāsu sukha sampattīsu

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, meghassa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja meghassa tatiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, megho ututo samuṭṭhahitvā dharaṇitalaruhe tiṇarukkhalatāgumbaosadhivanappatayo parirakkhati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja meghaḥ ututas samuṭṭhahitvā dharaṇi talaruhe tiṇa rukkha latā gumba osadhi vanappatayaḥ parirakkhati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yoniso manasikāraṁ nibbattetvā tena yoniso manasikārena samaṇadhammo parirakkhitabbo, yoniso manasikāramūlakā sabbe kusalā dhammā.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena yonisas manasikāram nibbattetvā tena yonisas manasikārena samaṇa dhammaḥ parirakkhitabbaḥ yonisas manasikāra mūlakā sabbe kusalāḥ dhammāḥ

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, meghassa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja meghassa catuttham aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, megho vassamāno naditaḷākapokkharaṇiyo kandarapadarasarasobbhaudapānāni ca paripūreti udakadhārāhi;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja meghaḥ vassamānaḥ nadi taḷāka pokkharaṇiyaḥ kandara pada rasa rasobbha udapānāni ca paripūreti udaka dhārāhi

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āgamapariyattiyā dhammameghamabhivassayitvā adhigamakāmānaṁ mānasaṁ paripūrayitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena āgama pariyattiyā dhamma megham abhivassayitvā adhigama kāmānam mānasam

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, meghassa pañcamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja meghassa pañcamam aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, therena sāriputtena dhammasenāpatinā—
analyzed: mahā rāja therena sāriputtena dhamma senāpatinā

original: ‘Bodhaneyyaṁ janaṁ disvā,
analyzed: bodhaneyyam janam disvā

original: satasahassepi yojane;
analyzed: sata sahasse pi yojane

original: Khaṇena upagantvāna,
analyzed: khaṇena upagantvāna

original: bodheti taṁ mahāmunī’”ti.
analyzed: bodha iti tam mahā muni iti

original: Meghaṅgapañho chaṭṭho.
analyzed: meghaṅga pañhaḥ chaṭṭho
